    decreaseTime(double) - Method in class model.Bomba

    destroyTile(int, int) - Method in class model.GameModel
    Destroys a destructible tile at the specified coordinates.
    DestructibleTile - Class in model
    Represents a tile that blocks movement until it is destroyed by a bomb explosion.
    DestructibleTile(int, int) - Constructor for class model.DestructibleTile

    detonatePressed - Variable in class controller.KeyHandler
    True while J is held — triggers detonation of walking bomb.
    direction - Variable in class model.drone

    downPressed - Variable in class controller.KeyHandler
    True while S is held — moves hero downward.
    drawBomb(Graphics2D, Bomba) - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Draws a bomb (normal or powered) at its tile location.
    drawDrones(Graphics) - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Draws all drones from the GameModel onto the Graphics context.
    drawHero(Graphics) - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Draws the hero sprite at the hero's current position.
    drawTiles(Graphics) - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Draws all tiles, overlays (bomb ranges), powerups, exit and hero highlight.
    drawWalkingBombs(Graphics) - Method in class model.GamePanel
    Draws all walking bombs (movable bombs) and injects their movement sprites if needed.
    drone - Class in model
